sentences.en: " You may be a processor , Yu - ting, but you do talk a lot of rot!
sentences.cn: “ 玉亭, 不能不说你这大学教授狗屁!

sentences.en: Chopping onions is a cinch with a food processor.
sentences.cn: 用食品加工器切洋葱是一件轻松的工作.

sentences.en: In a food processor, liquefy the tomato, tomato paste and cucumber.
sentences.cn: 食物搅拌器中, 加入西红柿, 西红柿酱膏和黄瓜,搅拌,直到成液体.

sentences.en: Intel makes the lead on technology what to calculate in processor.
sentences.cn: 英特尔在措置器制造科技上的超前并不算什么.

sentences.en: It is a good idea to blend it in a food processor as this lightens the mixture.
sentences.cn: 把它放到食品加工器里搅拌是个好主意，因为这样能够使混合物的分量减轻。

sentences.en: It'should not take processor, timer and other devices to connect heater automatically.
sentences.cn: 加热器不应使用程序器 、 定时器或其它装置来自动接通加热器.

sentences.en: Making the pastry is a breeze if you have a food processor.
sentences.cn: 如果你有食品加工机，做这种点心轻而易举。

sentences.en: Planesport of Suo Ni PS 3 used this kind of processor.
sentences.cn: 索尼PS3游戏机就采用了这种措置器.

sentences.en: Put all the ingredients, including a pinch of salt, into a food processor.
sentences.cn: 把包括一撮盐在内的所有配料放入食品加工机。

sentences.en: Raster image processor consists of two parts: part section and control.
sentences.cn: 平栅图像办理器包含两局部: 注释局部和把持局部.

sentences.en: Such code must usually be written in assembly language processor - independent.
sentences.cn: 一些代码必须用汇编语言编写.

sentences.en: The food processor can shred all kinds of vegetables.
sentences.cn: 这架食品加工机可将各种蔬菜切丝切条.

sentences.en: The software includes a processor program and a PC program.
sentences.cn: 该系统软件包括单片机程序和PC机软件.

sentences.en: This is one of the most common operations in a word processor.
sentences.cn: 这种操作实质上是一种配置.
美国的金枪鱼加工厂商

sentences.en: When cooked, drain off the juices and put the meat in a processor or mincer.
sentences.cn: 肉煮熟后，沥干肉汁，将其放入食品加工机或绞肉机中。

words.tran_cn: 经过特殊加工（或处理）的
过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移
开始；继续做；行进（proceed的ing形式）
处理器；[计]处理程序；[经管]加工者

phrases.tran_cn: 数据处理器；数据处理程序
食品加工机；食物处理机
后置处理程序；后信息处理机
n. 信号处理机；讯息处理者
视频处理器，图象信号处理器
n. 文字处理机；文字处理软件

trans.tran_cn: 加工，数据处理机，（计算机的）中央处理器，加工机（或工人）
trans.tran_en: the central part of a computer that deals with the commands and information it is given
